sentences.sentence: "So do I, too," said the barge-woman with great heartiness.
"So it is, so it is," said the Mole, with great heartiness.
sentences.translation: “是啊，是啊。”鼹鼠莫尔打心眼里说。

sentences.sentence: The owners of the little inn always provided service to their guests with heartiness.
sentences.translation: 这家小旅馆的主人总是热心地为客人提供服务。
